content.rendered:
Programs

(The Programs of Shri Krishna Bhakti Yoga of GEOKC)

 Applicable for all, specifically for devotees initiated by Pujya Guruji for the greatest effect of his Mantra and spiritual progress

The significant role of Shri Krishna Bhakti Yoga of GEOKC and the joy of constant communion with Lord Krishna (Lila Avatar)

GEOKC is only dedicated to Lord Krishna and as our dedication to Him all of our programs and services are offered to Him. Most of these programs and services are created as devotee’s life-long activities to give spiritual and educational knowledge and to practice on their regular basis. Based on the Goal of GEOKC the areas, related with all programs and services can be based or known as styles or types of programs to perfectly understand Hinduism, Yoga, Bhakti, Bhakti Yoga and other religious, cultural or social subjects through each program’s spiritual masters.

These programs specifically related with the true Bhakti bhava (devotional state of mind) to fulfill the needs of Shri Krishna Bhakti Yoga of GEOKC and open the path of self-realization.

To read or to find out more about these programs, please make a step now.

GEOKC programs names are as follows

Spiritual Discourse
Bhakti Sadhana

  • Services of Yoga Center
  • GEOKC Devotional Music

GEOKC Traditional Bhajans
GEOKC Kirtan Heritage

  • Services of Padasevana and Dasya

Path of Popularization and Expansion

  • GEOKC Shri Krishna Murari Bhakti Moment
  • GEOKC Shrimad Bhagavad-Gita Satsang Group

Satsang Services
Ten Avatars of Lord Vishnu
Ashram Spiritual Guidance

  • Gopinath Bhakti Ashram
  • Radha-Krishna Raas Lila Temple
  • Radha-Krishna Raas Lila Temple Services Form (PDF)
  • Ashram Events
  • GEOKC Vaishnava Events
  • Akhand Kirtan
  • Seekers Spiritual Programs
  • Seekers Spiritual Programs Form (PDF)
  • Seekers Sacred Time
  • Seekers Visitation Information
  • Temporary Residential Facilities
  • Permanent Residential Facilities

Shop for Lord Krishna

To see the detail of each program and how to join please click on the following link:
Program Information
